Classes/FxElement.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms.abstract: Primarily an internal function used by configuration routines to add the appropriate binding strategy.

Classes/FxElement.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms.abstract: Primarily an internal function used by configuration routines to add the appropriate binding strategy.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Field list that owns theis field.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: validate(_:)
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Adds the specified validation rule to the set of field validation rules.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: validate(_:_:)
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Constructs and adds an unnamed validation rule to the set of field validation rules.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: validate(name:message:_:)
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Constructs and adds the specified validation rule to the set of field validation rules.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: hasValidationRules
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns true if required rule or validation rules exist.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: removeAllValidationRules()
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Removes all validation rules.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: removeValidationRule(_:)
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Removes the named rule from the list of validation rules.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: isValid()
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns true if field is valid and all validation rules passed.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: checkValidation()
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Checks all validation rules. If validation fails error message will be returned, not set.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: setValidationTrigger(_:)
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Validation triggers are used to fire validation rules when a given event occurs.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: format(_:)
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Defines text formatter to be used for rx.text binding.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: formatter
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Gets and sets current formatter.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: asFormattedText
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns the field’s current value as formatted text.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: min(length:)
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Defines validation rule that states field text values must be at least N characters long.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: minLength
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns current maxLength value. Changing updates the validation rule appropriately.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: value(_:)
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Sets initial value of field. Value will be bound to view or control by FxForm.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: value()
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Generic function returns current value as? type T. If T is unknown type returned value will be nil.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Clears the current value.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: isEmpty
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns true if current value is empty.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: asBool
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns current value as Bool.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: asOptionalBool
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns current value as Bool or nil if value is false.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: asDouble
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns current value as Double.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: asOptionalDouble
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns current value as Double or nil if value is empty.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: asInt
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns current value as Int.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: asOptionalInt
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns current value as Int or nil if value is empty.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: asText
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns current value as String.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: asOptionalText
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns current value as String or nil if value is empty.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: error
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Gets the current error message. Value will be propagated to bound view, if any.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: clearError()
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: enabled(_:)
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Defines the Enabled flag state for later binding to a control.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: isEnabled
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Gets and sets the current enabled state. Value may be propagated to bound view.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: hidden(_:)
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Defines the Hidden flag state for later binding to a view or control.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: isHidden
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Gets and sets the current hidden state. Value may be propagated to bound view.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Called from FxForm.bind() to perform standard value, error, and attribute bindings to the previously assigned view.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Returns current maxLength value. Changing updates the validation rule appropriately.

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: asObservable()
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: This observable automatically fires whenever the base value is set or updated

Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.name: message
Classes/FxField.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms7F.abstract: Gets and sets current message value. Setting may propagate value to bound views.

Classes/FxForm.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms6Fx.abstract: Returns FxField with the given id. Note that this field is returned from the managed fields list and may not neccesarily be

Classes/FxForm.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms6Fx.name: makeIterator()
Classes/FxForm.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms6Fx.abstract: Returns iterator that will sequence through all bound FxField‘s in tab order.

Classes/FxForm.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms6Fx.abstract: Runs through our list of fields and returns the current responder, if any.

Classes/FxForm.html#/s:12RxSwiftForms6Fx.abstract: Convenience function to automatically change the background color of bound fields if those fields are invalid.

Classes/FxForm.html.name: FxForm
Classes/FxForm.html.abstract: Reactive class that controls binding specific FxField’s to specifc views.

Classes/FxFields.html.name: FxFields
Classes/FxFields.html.abstract: Reactive class that manages a list of FxFields.

Classes/FxField.html.name: FxField
Classes/FxField.html.abstract: Reactive class that manages the identity, value, and validation for a specific field or element on the form.

Classes/FxScrollingService.html.name: FxScrollingService
Classes/FxScrollingService.html.abstract: Manages the scrollview and adjusts the content area for keyboard show/hide events.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
